title: Water Supply Issue
description: Water supply will be unavailable in Block C.

title: Network Maintenance
description: Campus internet may be slow during maintenance hours.

title: Electricity Shutdown
description: Scheduled power shutdown in Academic Building A.

title: Library Closed
description: Central library will remain closed for inventory check.

title: Road Repair Work
description: Main gate road repair may cause traffic delay.

title: Classroom Maintenance
description: Classrooms in Block B will be unavailable temporarily.

title: Water Tank Cleaning
description: Water tanks will be cleaned. Expect low pressure.

title: Server Upgrade
description: Student portal may be unavailable during server upgrade.

title: Hostel Inspection
description: Routine inspection will be conducted in all hostels.

title: Fire Drill
description: Emergency fire drill will be conducted campus-wide.
